text: "Tuesday" is the fourth single from the album Hourly, Daily by Australian rock band You Am I. It was released in 1997 and reached number 29 on the Australian charts.You Am I.com.au ==Track listing== # "Tuesday" – 3:15 # "Circles" - 2:41 # "When You Got Dry" - 3:22 # "Tonight I'll Be Staying Here With You (live)" - 3:02 "Circles" is a cover of The Who song. "When You Got Dry" was originally released on the very limited When You Got Dry/How Much Is Enough 7". "Tonight I'll Be Staying Here With You" is a cover of the Bob Dylan song and is a live, acoustic performance from The Metro Theatre in Sydney. ==References== Category:1997 singles Category:You Am I songs Category:1996 songs Category:Songs written by Tim Rogers (musician)
title: Tuesday (You Am I song)
